title: How can we read 200 or even 300 pages in one day? - Quora

response.answer_text: During my school days, when i need to go to school my mom used to wake me up at 6:30 AM but whenever it was off i by myself would wake up at 4:30 AM and go on the playground with my mates to play cricket.  Now coming back to your question ! how can you read 200 or even 300 pages in one day ? The solution that i am going to recommend will let you even read up to 500 pages. There are basically three ways that will help you to read your desired aim THE CURIOSITY - Whenever i would wake up at 4:30 , i had that craving to play cricket and enjoy. so whenever we pick any book ,make sure it makes you curious not tepid.THE HABIT - According to certain research,Forty percent of our daily work is a habit which we do repeatedly. so if WE want to read to our targeted pages we should generate habit to read.THE TASTE - On sunday, i was able to wake up so much early because i was doing what i enjoyed the most and i had a tasty taste in cricket same applies to us if we want to read more than expected,chose the genre we enjoy the most.  SHASHI THAROR, who is avid reader and finest writer ,i think,possess all the above qualities and much more. PEACE!
